results.content: This is a great course. I will view it again to get a better grasp of the material. The instructor presents the information clearly and concisely.
results.content_html: This is a great course. I will view it again to get a better grasp of the material. The instructor presents the information clearly and concisely.

results.content: The first half was pretty good by the last half was somehow rushed. The DOM explanations were rushed. I learned much better reading W3C lessons. I will give kudos for the practice quizzes and practice activities.
results.content_html: The first half was pretty good by the last half was somehow rushed. The DOM explanations were rushed. I learned much better reading W3C lessons. I will give kudos for the practice quizzes and practice activities.

results.content: I'd recommend this course both to JS beginners and to anyone looking to fill the gaps in their knowledge. This helped me to ultimately gain a better understanding and appreciation of the language.
results.content_html: I'd recommend this course both to JS beginners and to anyone looking to fill the gaps in their knowledge. This helped me to ultimately gain a better understanding and appreciation of the language.

results.content: I thought the course was more advanced but it's fine for an overall introduction to Javascript. Not what I was looking for but great for the frontend devs in the team. Good job!
results.content_html: I thought the course was more advanced but it's fine for an overall introduction to Javascript. Not what I was looking for but great for the frontend devs in the team. Good job!

results.content: Great clear teaching of the hard to grasp basics of Js.
results.content_html: Great clear teaching of the hard to grasp basics of Js.

results.content: This is such a complete course on one of the most popular languages right now.  I really like the way Elvio breaks down the native methods, using the Chrome console.  Ensuring that I understand the ins and outs of the language. I would recommend this to anyone trying to break into coding or needing a refresher on JS.
results.content_html: This is such a complete course on one of the most popular languages right now. I really like the way Elvio breaks down the native methods, using the Chrome console. Ensuring that I understand the ins and outs of the language. I would recommend this to anyone trying to break into coding or needing a refresher on JS.
